name: Recess
description:
Recess is an exploration based game, where you play as a kid during recess. The game focuses on the joy of discovery, and is covered in hot, sticky layers of charm! I have spent over a year filling this environment with games, secrets, and other crazy, and engaging experiences.

Here are a few testimonials from some of our satisfied players:

"Wow! This was a much better experience than I was expecting. 3/10." - Some Guy

"I really enjoyed the small file size. Uninstalling was a breeze!" - Notapaid Actor

"This is what you've been doing for a year?" - Disappointed Father
